testcase.classname: Book a Ticket using Adacting Page

testcase.system-out: Given Launch Adactin Browser................................................passed When The user enter the credntials username and password....................passed And click Login.............................................................passed Then Verify the entered details are correct.................................passed When Search the required hotel location and room and inDate and outDate and adult along with the Dates and click Search.passed And Select the Required Hotel and Continue..................................passed And Enter details fname and lname and address and cc and cvv for booking Confimration and Book.passed And Print the Order number..................................................passed And Click Logout............................................................passed
